content.rendered: Don’t worry about people stealing an idea. If it’s original, you will have to ram it down their throats.

excerpt.rendered: Don’t worry about people stealing an idea. If it’s original, you will have to ram it down their throats.

content.rendered: Draw lines, young man, many lines; from memory or from nature – it is in this way you will become a good artist. (said to Edgar Degas)

excerpt.rendered: Draw lines, young man, many lines; from memory or from nature – it is in this way you will become a good artist. (said to Edgar Degas)

content.rendered: Like all forms of design, visual design is about problem solving, not about personal preference or unsupported opinion.

excerpt.rendered: Like all forms of design, visual design is about problem solving, not about personal preference or unsupported opinion.

content.rendered: Designers think everything done by someone else is awful, and that they could do it better themselves, which explains why I designed my own living room carpet, I suppose.

excerpt.rendered: Designers think everything done by someone else is awful, and that they could do it better themselves, which explains why I designed my own living room carpet, I suppose.

content.rendered: If you know how to use a pencil to draw, you could probably draw anything. Now apply that to everything in life.

excerpt.rendered: If you know how to use a pencil to draw, you could probably draw anything. Now apply that to everything in life.

content.rendered: A user interface is like a joke. If you have to explain it, it’s not that good.

yoast_head_json.og_description: A user interface is like a joke. If you have to explain it, it’s not that good.

content.rendered: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
